name: Physics
description: Physics is the study of matter, energy, and the fundamental forces of nature.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemistry is the science that deals with the composition, structure, and properties of substances.

name: Biology
description: Biology is the study of living organisms and their interactions with each other and their environment.

name: Astronomy
description: Astronomy is the scientific study of celestial objects such as stars, planets, and galaxies.

name: Geology
description: Geology is the study of the Earth's structure, composition, and the processes that shape it.
